ticket.title: [PATCH] Skip XML support in scaffold generator
ticket.original-body: The actions in a scaffolded controller respond with both XML and HTML. In most cases XML is not required and the code is never used or has to be deleted. I propose an option to the generator *--no-xml* which will give you a standard controller that only responds with HTML.
